languages.text: "Проклятье, почему именно Годьерда? Не знаю, зачем Император велел тебе убить ее, но эта смерть не должна быть напрасной".

traits.locale_text: "Проклятье, почему именно Годьерда? Не знаю, зачем ты убила ее, но эта смерть не должна быть напрасной".

languages.text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
languages.original_text: "Проклятье, почему именно Годьерда? Не знаю, зачем Император велел тебе убить ее, но эта смерть не должна быть напрасной".

traits.locale_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
"Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
"Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
"Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
"Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
"Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."

languages.text: «¡Maldita sea! ¿Por qué Godierda? No sé por qué el Emperador le ordenó que la matase, pero hemos de asegurarnos de que no haya muerto en vano».
languages.original_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."

traits.locale_text: «¡Maldita sea! ¿Por qué Godierda? No sé por qué el Emperador le ordenó que la matase, pero hemos de asegurarnos de que no haya muerto en vano».

languages.text: 「なぜゴディエルダでなければならなかった？皇帝がなぜあなたに彼女を殺せと命じたのかわからないが、彼女の死を無駄にするな」
languages.original_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜゴディエルダでなければならなかった？皇帝がなぜあなたに彼女を殺せと命じたのかわからないが、彼女の死を無駄にするな」

languages.text: “真该死，为什么非得是戈迪亚达不可？我不明白帝皇为什么要命令你杀死她，但我们必须保证她没有白死。”
languages.original_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."

traits.locale_text: “真该死，为什么非得是戈迪亚达不可？我不明白帝皇为什么要命令你杀死她，但我们必须保证她没有白死。”

languages.text: "Verdammt, warum musste es Godierda sein? Ich weiß nicht, warum der Imperator ihren Tod angeordnet hat, aber wir müssen sicherstellen, dass sie nicht umsonst gestorben ist."
languages.original_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."

traits.locale_text: "Verdammt, warum musste es Godierda sein? Ich weiß nicht, warum der Imperator ihren Tod angeordnet hat, aber wir müssen sicherstellen, dass sie nicht umsonst gestorben ist."

languages.text: « Bon sang, pourquoi a-t-il fallu que Gordierda le paie de sa vie ? J'ignore pourquoi l'Empereur vous a ordonné de la tuer, mais nous devons veiller à ce que sa mort ne reste pas vaine. »
languages.original_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."

traits.locale_text: « Bon sang, pourquoi a-t-il fallu que Gordierda le paie de sa vie ? J'ignore pourquoi l'Empereur vous a ordonné de la tuer, mais nous devons veiller à ce que sa mort ne reste pas vaine. »

languages.text: "Kahretsin ya, neden Godierda'nın ölmesi gerekti ki? İmparator'un sana neden onu öldürmeni emrettiğini bilmiyorum ama beyhude yere canını vermediğinden emin olmamız gerek."
languages.original_text: "Damn it, why did it have to be Godierda? I don't know why the Emperor ordered you to kill her, but we must see to it that she did not die in vain."
